turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hello, I want to order a coffee drink from Starbucks

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Hi, what kind of coffee do you want?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I wanted something latte.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Did you have a specific latte in mind?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes something light.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok, I'll send you a Starbucks menu so you can peruse it

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Ok, thank you. I'll give you my choice in a minute.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: No problem, take your time.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Ok, I want a Iced Starbucks Blonde® Juniper Latte

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok, I will make the call and find out what's in one of those

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Ok, thank you so much. Let me know if it's available.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok, they are seriously smooth, subtly sweet Starbucks® Blonde Espresso, with milk and ice mingle beautifully with juniper syrup. This beverage has a light, pine-like flavor with delightful citrus undertones. We accentuate the remarkable flavor by dusting the top with pine-citrus sugar.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: That sounds delicious

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok, I will call and confirm afterwards. Did you want a tall or a grande?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I will take a grande just because it sounds so good.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok, a grande it is.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Thank you very much.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok, I have called and ordered your latte for you

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Ok, where is the location of the Starbucks?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: It is located at Route 30 and Tornita St. in York, Pa.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Ok I will pick it up at the Route 30 and Tornita St.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok, anything else I can do?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No, have a good day.
